item.title: GameStop's Ryan Cohen lays out his vision for company — it's not to be the next MicroStrategy
item.description: GameStop chief Ryan Cohen said his video game retailer is not trying to mimic others in becoming a large holder of digital tokens.

item.title: Analysts raise Nvidia price targets after Trump's China chip decision. One sees $5 trillion market cap ahead
item.description: The company hopes to resume shipping its H20 general processing units to China after the U.S. largely restricted the sale of the chips to Beijing in A...

item.title: Bet on 'dependable reporters' this earnings season that have a track record of beats, says Evercore ISI
item.description: Several stocks this earnings season have a history of surpassing Wall Street's expectations, according to Evercore ISI.

item.title: JPMorgan upgrades Otis Worldwide, citing a more ‘stable’ near-term outlook
item.description: Otis Worldwide may be poised to rally after a pullback spurred by President Donald Trump's tariffs announcement, according to JPMorgan.
